Cell.Data: PLAYER_INTERACTION_DVAR

The DEV TEAM / MISC NOTES column contains info on what text between { } signs means (if applicable). It usually stands for either a numeric value, or a numeric value with an icon. Text between [ ] signs stands for a certain type of icon.
SCENE ID
TEXT ID
ENGLISH STRING
LOCALIZED STRING
ALTERNATIVE ENGLISH STRING
ALTERNATIVE LOCALIZED STRING
LOCALIZATION NOTES
DEV TEAM / MISC NOTES
HEADER
GREET_FIRSTMEET_NEGATIVE_01
Watch yourself, {STR_leaderName}! Your honesty will be measured and judged, so choose your words carefully. The Dvar do not allocate resources to taking care of prisoners…
小心，{STR_leaderName}！我们将检验你所说之事是否属实，所以请注意你的言辞。矮人可不会浪费资源来照顾囚犯…

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
HEADER
GREET_FIRSTMEET_NEGATIVE_02

Who is this krsh belad come to ruin my day? You had better have something good to offer the Dvar. We were abandoned to our fates once, and we still have no tolerance for ignorant individuals who would do the same again.
是哪个冒失鬼跑来毁掉我一整天的心情？你最好是为矮人带来了好东西。我们曾被抛弃并独自接受命运的考验。现在，我们仍然无法容忍那些对我们做出同样事情之人。

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
HEADER
GREET_FIRSTMEET_NEUTRAL_01
Welcome to the greatest Dvar consortium in the galaxy! We have plenty of resources to trade, assuming you have something interesting to offer us. Or did you want to discuss a deal of sorts?
欢迎来到这个星系中最伟大的矮人财团！如果你有让我们感兴趣的东西，我们也有很多资源可以交易。还是说，你想讨论些别的事情？

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
HEADER
GREET_FIRSTMEET_NEUTRAL_02

Hail, stranger. You speak with the Dvar. If you are here to undermine our efforts on this world, you will find us impossible to dig out. But we make loyal allies. Pick your intention, and quickly. We have work to get back to.
你好，陌生人。在你面前的是矮人。如果你是来这儿破坏我们在这个星球上的劳动成果的话，你会发现我们可不是那么好对付的。但我们会是忠诚的同盟。说明你的来意，快点，我们回去还有活儿要干。

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
HEADER
GREET_FIRSTMEET_NEUTRAL_03

Greetings, comrade. Stay on our good side and you will witness the reclamation of the galaxy by our Dvar hands. Disrespect us and our ordnance will tear your clan to shreds. I’d give it some thought if I were you, hah-hah!
你好，朋友。对我们友好，你就能见证我们矮人亲手夺回这个星系。如果不尊重我们，我们的大炮就会把你的族群轰成碎片。如果我是你的话，我肯定会好好度量一下的，哈哈哈！

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
HEADER
GREET_FIRSTMEET_POSITIVE_01

Ha, if it isn’t {STR_leaderName}! And to think I almost didn’t look up from my drill press. The Dvar are all hard at work repairing the damage caused by the Cataclysm, but we can certainly spare a few minutes for you. Looking to trade?
哈，这不是{STR_leaderName}么！这么一想，我的目光好像从来都没有从我的钻床上抬起来过。我们矮人全都在不辞辛劳地修复大灾变造成的伤害，不过我们当然可以为你挤出一点时间来。想要交易么？

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
HEADER
GREET_FIRSTMEET_POSITIVE_02
To the stone, {STR_leaderName}, it is good to meet you. You have demonstrated your commitment to prosperity, a respectable attribute among the Dvar. Come – let us talk of the future.
托石头的福，很高兴见到你，{STR_leaderName}。你已经证明了你对繁荣的承诺，在矮人的观念中，这是值得尊敬的品质。来吧，让我们一起谈谈未来。

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
HEADER
GREET_NEGATIVE_01
You again? By Dvarnos, my patience is truly being tested now. Go on then, spit out your words so we can get this done with quickly.
又是你？说真的，我的忍耐已经快到极限了。好吧，有话快说，我们赶快解决。

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
HEADER
GREET_NEUTRAL_01
The Dvar Consortium bids you greetings, and welcomes a conversation about important matters. What troubles you?
矮人财团向你问好，我们欢迎对重要问题进行讨论。你有什么烦恼？

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
HEADER
GREET_TRADE_PROPOSE_NEUTRAL_01
Comrade, we would like to trade some of our bountiful wealth for some of yours, if you’d be willing. We’re sending the details over now.
朋友，如果你愿意的话，我们愿意用一些宝贵的财富来交换你的宝物。我们正在向你发送详细信息。

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
HEADER
GREET_TRADE_RECEIVED_01
Our resource allocators are taking measure of your trade proposal. Stand by.
我们的资源分配者正在考虑你的交易提议，请稍等。

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
ACTION
DECLARE_WAR_01
Enough! {STR_reasons}. I will not sit idly by while you are free to take advantage of whoever you desire. War is coming your way, longshanks!
够了！{STR_reasons}。别以为你可以尽情地占别人便宜，我可不会袖手旁观。战争正在逼近，你这长腿之人！

{STR_reasons} is a list of reasons, written like "You trespassed" and can be found in this excel sheet. This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
ACTION
DECLARE_WAR_02
Sound the sirens and light the battle pyres. You have disgraced this planet for too long. {STR_reasons}. Dvar steel will be the end of your misbegotten kind!
拉响警报，点燃火堆。一直以来，你都让这个星球蒙羞。{STR_reasons}。矮人的钢铁将会给你这种卑鄙之人带来末日！

{STR_reasons} is a list of reasons, written like "You trespassed" and can be found in this excel sheet. This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
ACTION
INSULT_01
Zorje dg’lak! Go spread your filth elsewhere. I have work to do, and your child-like mewling is wearing down my concentration.
滚开！到别的地方散播你的污秽。我还有正事要办，你那孩子般的呜咽分散了我的注意力。

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
ACTION
INSULT_02
Not only are your morals deplorable, but the sight of you sickens me. The other leaders here would do well to heed my warnings about you.
你道德卑劣，我一看到你就感到恶心。这里的其他首领将会听从我对你的警告。

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
ACTION
INSULT_03
Is THAT your colony? Its ramshackle qualities remind me of the very first mountain-side shelter I built out of sticks and stones... as a toddler.
那玩意儿就是你的殖民地？它破烂不堪的样子让我想起了我用树枝和石头在山腰搭建的第一个屋棚…那时候我还只是一个蹒跚学步的孩子。

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
ACTION
DECLARE_FRIENDSHIP_01
Hah, {STR_leaderName}! You old stone-chewer. Everyone could stand to learn from your steadfast leadership!
哈，{STR_leaderName}！你这个老顽固。所有人都能够从你坚定的领导中学到东西！

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
ACTION
DECLARE_FRIENDSHIP_02
Admiration, comrade! You’ve constructed quite the holdfast there. Truly a jewel among gravel.
佩服，朋友！你建造了如此坚固的东西，真可谓是砂砾中的一颗明珠。

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
ACTION
DECLARE_FRIENDSHIP_03
Your crafts and armaments could rival even our own! That kind of dedication is rare and valuable. We’ll certainly have to trade soon, hah-hah!
你的工艺和武器甚至可以与我们相媲美！这种专注精神罕见而宝贵，我们很快将会有贸易往来了，哈哈！

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
TRADE
ACCEPT_KINDLY_POSITIVE
To the stone, comrade, it’s a deal!
向石头致敬，朋友。就这么定了！

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
TRADE
ACCEPT_DOUBTFUL
I suppose that’ll do, but don’t come round asking for any more favors!
我想那样也行，不过今后不要再来找我帮忙了！

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
TRADE
DECLINE_IMBALANCE_01
Not a chance. Dig deeper in your pockets next time.
不可能。下次再多带些钱来吧。

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
TRADE
DECLINE_IMBALANCE_02
I’ve got the feeling you’re holding out on me. Draft up a new deal with more coming my way!
感觉你好像对我有所保留，写一份对我更有利的新协议再来吧！

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.

Note that all the texts in this document that refer to two people - the speaker and the one spoken too - that can both be male or female.
Note that use of the 'localized' and 'alternative localized string' only applies for the gender of the speaker.
If the gender of the person spoken to requires inflection, please try to translate the text in a way that doesn't require such inflection. If this is impossible, please get in touch with us informing us of which lines this concerns and how they would be inflected in the language you are translating too.
